message: Bottle after MBCC 2024. Black colour, malty aroma with wood barrel. Clear coffee and wood in the taste as well, really nice!

Beer Name: Toppling Goliath Kentucky Brunch🇺🇸Stout - Imperial Flavored / Pastry
message: Thank you for sharing this Chris - Black with a brown head - Dark malt aroma with wood barrel aroma - Dark malt body with coffee flavours and good wood barrel flavours as well - Dark malt coffee and wood barrel flavours goes into the finish - This was real good

Beer Name: Toppling Goliath Kentucky Brunch🇺🇸Stout - Imperial Flavored / Pastry
message:
Boxed beer at home, proper glassware. Pitch black, oily thick pour with a brown head that quickly disappears. Maple upfront alongside roasted coffee, bourbon in the nose. Taste is beautifully layered coffee, chocolate brownie, lots of bourbon barrel character, lots of burnt caramel - with the most balanced balance there is. Big bodied, oily rich mouthfeel, medium carbonation.
Truly one of a kind beer, brewed to perfection.
translated messages: Boxed beer at home, proper glassware. Pitch black, oily thick pour with a brown head that quickly disappears. Maple upfront alongside roasted coffee, bourbon in the nose. Taste is beautifully layered coffee, chocolate brownie, lots of bourbon barrel character, lots of burnt caramel - with the most balanced balance there is. Big bodied, oily rich mouthfeel, medium carbonation. Truly one of a kind beer, brewed to perfection.

Beer Name: Toppling Goliath Kentucky Brunch🇺🇸Stout - Imperial Flavored / Pastry
message: From backlog. (As 2018 Vintage) 0,3 litre Bottle, from a trade, at a share in Brumunddal. Black with little head. Roasted malts, coffee, barrel, some bourbon, some sweetness, some dry bitterness, one of The best beers i’ve had.

message:
Borefts 2024. A black beer with a beige lacing. Aroma of raisins, vanilla, bourbon, strong dark malt. Taste of sweet strong dark malt, vanilla, bourbon.  
Earlier Rating: 12/22/2016 Total Score: 4.2
25cl bottle from a trade with omhper, many thanks Per!!! (2008 Version) Pours almost black with a huge most good lasting brownish head. Aroma of intense chocolate, bourbon, vanilla, oak, some alcohol. Taste of strong dark roasted malt, chocolate, coffee, vanilla, wood, liquorice, the alcohol in present, really nice beer, thanks a lot Per!

message:
Keg at borefts. Pours black, nose is chocolate, toffee, meaty, taste is similar, some liquorice. 
Earlier Rating: 9/12/2014 Total Score: 4
Bottle at Craig’s. Pours black, nose is roasted chocolate, little oxidised, taste is quite sweet, soy, dry, chocolate, meaty. A little past its best but thanks Craig!
translated messages: The beer pours black with chocolate, toffee, and meaty aromas. The taste is similar with some liquorice. Earlier rating: 9/12/2014, total score: 4. The bottle also pours black with roasted chocolate and oxidized notes. The taste is sweet with soy, dry, and chocolate flavors, along with meaty undertones. The beer is a bit past its best, but the reviewer thanks Craig for the tasting opportunity.

25May2023 Dark roast malts, cacao, cognac, brandy, dry, vanilla. Hazy, very dark brown, small, frothy, beige head. Light bitter. Bittersweet, dark roast malts, cacao, burnt molasses, French oak, vanilla, soft carb, full bod. Outstanding, dry, complex,well-balanced. Bottle at L6 Tasting, London.

message:
Ciemnobrunatne, praktycznie czarne nieprzezroczyste piwo z niezłą pianą która dość szybko opada i lekko zdobi szkło. Aromat to największy atut tego piwa. Czekolada, kawa, kakao, lukrecja, trochę bourbonu, drewna, w tle wanilia jest też odrobina melasy, miodu. W smaku niestety gorzej, gorzka czekolada, kawa, toffi, dużo nut palonych,  bardziej wytrawne niż słodkie. Duże oczekiwania, nie do końca spełnione.
Butelka 25 cl, 2019
translated messages: Dark brown, almost black opaque beer with decent foam that quickly falls and slightly decorates the glass. The aroma is the biggest advantage of this beer. Chocolate, coffee, cocoa, licorice, a bit of bourbon, wood, in the background there is also a hint of molasses, honey. Unfortunately, the taste is worse, bitter chocolate, coffee, toffee, a lot of smoky notes, more bitter than sweet. Great expectations, not entirely fulfilled. Bottle 25 cl,

Beer Name: Schramm's The Heart of Darkness🇺🇸Mead - Melomel / Fruited
message: 187 ml wax capped and corked bottle, Batch #9.  Served in a Schramm's snifter, the mead pours a dark reddish/purple color.  I like the aroma a lot, the mead smells like cherries, raspberries, black currants, honey and some earthiness.  Taste is pretty much just like the aroma, but there's also a hint of floralness too.  It's fruity, sweet and jammy, but with a nice tart kick too.  Lots and lots of flavor!  Mouthfeel/body is full, it's slick and syrupy with pretty much no carbonation.  I thought this was an excellent mead, definitely worth trying if you ever get the chance!

Beer Name: Schramm's The Heart of Darkness🇺🇸Mead - Melomel / Fruited
message: Flaska från Schramm's, batch 9. Mörk djup rödlila, lämnar tjusiga gardiner på glaset. Intensiv och kompakt doft och smak utan att det sticker åt något håll. Bären kompletterar varandra och skapar en snygg helhet - körsbär och mandel som nästan går åt körsbärsklubba i förgrunden, utan att det blir en ren körsbärsbomb. Även mycket vanilj och vaniljsötma. Håller ihop snyggt och oerhört välgjort.
translated messages: Bottle from Schramm's, batch 9. Dark deep ruby red, leaves beautiful lace on the glass. Intense and compact aroma and taste without going off in any direction. The berries complement each other and create a nice whole - cherries and almond almost going towards cherry brandy in the foreground, without becoming a pure cherry bomb. Also a lot of vanilla and vanilla sweetness. Holds together nicely and incredibly well crafted.

Beer Name: Schramm's The Heart of Darkness🇺🇸Mead - Melomel / Fruited
message:
Appearance: Deep Ruby.
外观：深宝石红色。
5/5

Aroma: Blackberry, raspberry, cassis, sour cherry, honey, black chocolate, mint, rosemary and clove, with hints of tobacco and bay leaf.
气味：黑莓、树莓、黑醋栗、酸樱桃、蜂蜜、黑巧克力、薄荷、迷迭香和丁香，伴有些许烟草和月桂叶。
10/10

Taste: Tons of forest fruits, honey and syrup with sweet spice and wood. Luscious sweetness with mouthwatering but rounded acidity and velvety fine tannin. Lingering sweet tart finish with hints of dark fruits.
味道：大量的莓果、蜂蜜和糖浆，伴随着甜香料和木质感。甜蜜感伴随着令人口舌生津但又圆润的酸度和天鹅绒般细腻的单宁。尾韵酸甜而持久，呈现深色水果。
8/10

Mouthfeel: Full bodied, thick, oily and sticky.
口感：酒体饱满，厚重、油润而粘稠。
5/5

Overall
Incredibly big, intense and extremely vinous. With fascinating tertiary aroma in the glass, I was likely to feel as though it's an old Recioto. One of the best mead I've ever had.
令人难以置信的宏大和集中，同时像极了葡萄酒。杯中涌现出迷人的三类香气，让人有种在喝老年份雷乔托的感觉。我喝过的最好的蜂蜜酒之一。
18/20

Tasted: 2022-12-05

Beer Name: Schramm's The Heart of Darkness🇺🇸Mead - Melomel / Fruited
message: SARAthon 2022. Pours a deep red/purple color with no carbonation and nice legs. Insane fruit character. Tons of cherry juice and flesh, raspberry, and currant. Quite vinous and has a really nice tannin and acid profile to it. Notes of cocoa, caramel, honey, and a touch of spice. Like a cherry and berry pie. Incredibly rich fruit and honey character and a nice full body. Probably still not worth the price (to me anyway), but really excellent.
